name: Anya Petrova
routine: Anya sleeps at 11:15 pm and wakes up at 6:50 am to walk her Siberian Husky.
occupation: Anya Petrova is a travel blogger who is typically on the move but spends her home days writing and editing content.
thoughts: She's planning her next trip to the Siberian wilderness, slated to start on February 4th, 2024.
lifestyle: An adventurous lifestyle with a preference for extreme sports and outdoor activities influences her minimalist home needs.

name: Irina Smirnov
routine: Irina goes to sleep by 11 pm and wakes up at 6 am to prepare breakfast for her family.
occupation: Irina Smirnov is the owner of a small bookstore and usually opens the shop at 10 am after dropping her kids off at school.
thoughts: Irina was planning a special Valentine's Day book signing event in her store on 2024-02-04 with a local author.
lifestyle: Irina enjoys a cozy lifestyle, often hosting intimate gatherings with friends and family, always accompanied by her home-cooked meals.
